message.body: She bought me Bambu!
I'm curious if your diet persists on sugar alone lol
Yay!!!
You gonna save me any bambu?
If my son so much as cries, he rushes in to save his life. Best buds. http://imgur.com/cwXjrHr Look at this cute pair
Yea, that's not going to happen. The Bambu is gone. Shocker.
Omgsh and it's a pitbull!
How cute.
Good doggie.
Any chance you might consider the run tonight?
Hey, yea don't think I'm going to make it. I feel so tired. And I'm working tomorrow.
No worries. I'm a lot more tired than I anticipated. I went extra hard on legs yesterday at the gym.
I don't know how you have the energy to work out.
I feel like I want to pass out and go to bed.
It's a great feeling since it's difficult for me to feel sleepy at home
Can you talk?
Yup. Gimme a min
Call whenever you're ready
"Please don't leave me" The day we brought her home from the shelter. http://i.imgur.com/FopP98j.jpg?1 Look at those eyes! I've wanted to volunteer at shelters but I fear I would adopt them all@
That makes me sad.
There's a video of an owner who put a go pro on his dog to see what it does when he goes to work.

As soon as he shuts the for the dog runs to the window to watch him leave. Runs to the door. Then back to the window. Owner is coming back... Dog starts to whine for master. Then by the end of the video the dog is burrowing into the pile of clothes owner left on his bed.
All I could think was gosh. I'm never leaving my dog along if I got one.
So dog sitter then?
Or have more than one pet so they keep each other company!
That could work too.
My body hurts so much. Those lunges. Yowsa
Wake up!
I'm up I'm up!
Lol gotta get used to waking up earlier. Good morning!
Technically still morning!
So yes, good morning hahah!
That's why I said it hehe
I know, I was agreeing/reaffirming.
/hi5 and nod
When are you going into work again?
Have to be there by 7:45.
I have half an hour to kill in Chinatown.
What should I do?
I would run out to have tea but it would take at least 10 minutes before I'm there
Visit tiny shops. There's a hello kitty one.
Hahah I'm literally getting milk tea right now!
What just because I'm an Asian female you assume I like Hello Kitty?
No. First thing that came to mind that wasn't food in the immediate area
Sure...
Here's also a couple other miscellaneous shops but I don't recall the names.
There's*
Bonsai tree. Book store. Spas.
Hahah don't think I'm going to a spa, I have less than 30 minutes now.
